name: HUNTER FINDING FREEDIVING
description:
Hey Survivor! HUNTER FINDING FREEDIVING now...

Immerse yourself in the ocean and discover the lost city. Look around, from tanks to ruined buildings you can find everything. Be careful, the city is not abandoned.It's full of sharks. Defend yourself from the water raiders and collect more trophies. Use your speargun! Target the shark and shoot. Prepare yourself, they don’t come in singles.. they make groups! If you can not handle them, look for cover. You can count on how many beasts you are killing on the counter.
